body: Eriri you're a fucking loser lmao

Crix98, you're fucking retarted, you do realize that, don't you? Well, even if you don't, it's understandable, having learning difficulties and all. But seriously though, you ask that if it's something new. Have you never heard of loli hentai or just lolis in general before? I'd be quite surprised if you haven't as you're on a doujin site with thousands of em'. If this 'pedopornography' offends you or triggers your white-knight morals, then I think you should probably stay away from this site, and probably from hentai/doujins in general.
Man, this was so freaking good! Lolis with stockings are great. And that sidetail was nice too. If only this was longer, or like Lucas Underwear said, if it only it was a series.

What are you smoking Crix98? Didn't you read it? They might not even be human so no, this would not qualify as "pedopornography", not to mention the fact that this (like all the things here) is a work of fiction, and I hope you understand that fiction is not reality.
Cute. Love that its full color.
I wish this was a serie.
